:mod:`src.forecast.assess`
==========================

.. py:module:: src.forecast.assess


Module Contents
---------------

.. data:: logger
   

   

.. function:: asses_forecasts(df_total, df_meta)

   Assesses if and when a transformer will overload based on the forecasts and metadata.


   :Parameters:

       **df_total: pd.DataFrame**
           DataFrame with forecasts.

       **df_meta: pd.DataFrame**
           DataFrame with metadata of the transformer.

   :Returns:

       :obj:`pd.DataFrame`
           Result of the assessment.

       !! processed by numpydoc !!
